title: replace问题
author: 弥猫うた
txt_content:
String sound = sub.getString(key + ".Sound")
.replace("升级", "ENTITY_PLAYER_LEVELUP")
.replace("村民", "ENTITY_VILLAGER_YES");这样写可以听到声音但是会报错，求解
